remarks.format: ## Examples 交易應用程式所使用的範例組態檔，如下所示，可以是An example configuration file used by your transaction application can be as follows, `` `` `` `` `` `` 這個範例會指定交易的預設值。This example specifies the default values of a transaction. 具體來說，它會設定電腦名稱是負責協調所有的分散式的交易，在本機啟動 Distributed Transaction Coordinator (MSDTC) 及預設交易逾時之前的時間。此外，它會指定交易逾時之前，允許在電腦層級，也就是最大時間量可以只修改的設定。Specifically, it sets the computer name of the Distributed Transaction Coordinator (MSDTC) that is responsible for coordinating all distributed transactions started locally, and the default time after which a transaction times out. In addition, it specifies a setting that can only be modified at the machine level, which is the maximum amount of time allowed before a transaction times out.
